email_body: Greetings from Amazon.com. To finish resetting your password jarnold@enron.com, please visit our site using one of the personalized links below. The following link can be used to visit the site using the secure server: The following link can be used to visit the site using the standard server: It's easy. Simply click on one of the links above to return to our Web site. If this doesn't work, you may copy and paste the link into your browser's address window, or retype it there. Once you have returned to our Web site, you will be given instructions for resetting your password. If you have any difficulty resetting your password, please feel free to contact us by responding to this e-mail. Thank you for visiting Amazon.com! Amazon.com Earth's Biggest Selection http://www.amazon.com/
